entity.name: ElggEntity
entity.query: select e.site_guid AS site_guid, s.subtype AS subtype, e.guid AS entity_guid, e.owner_guid AS owner_guid, e.container_guid AS container_guid, e.access_id AS access_id, from_unixtime(e.time_updated) AS time_updated, o.title AS title, o.description AS description, NULL AS url from elgg_entities e join elgg_objects_entity o on e.guid = o.guid join elgg_entity_subtypes s on e.subtype = s.id where s.subtype IN ('blog', 'bookmarks', 'page_top', 'page', 'groupforumtopic', 'file', 'thewire') UNION select e.site_guid AS site_guid, e.type AS subtype, e.guid AS entity_guid, e.owner_guid AS owner_guid, e.container_guid AS container_guid, e.access_id AS access_id, from_unixtime(e.time_updated) AS time_updated, g.name AS title, g.description AS description, NULL as url from elgg_entities e join elgg_groups_entity g on e.guid = g.guid UNION select e.site_guid AS site_guid, e.type AS subtype, e.guid AS entity_guid, e.owner_guid AS owner_guid, e.container_guid AS container_guid, e.access_id AS access_id, from_unixtime(e.time_updated) AS time_updated, si.name AS title, si.description AS description, si.url AS url from elgg_entities e join elgg_sites_entity si on e.guid = si.guid

entity.name: ElggMetadata
entity.query: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN sn.string = 'excerpt' AND sn.id = d.name_id THEN sv.string END ) AS excerpt, MAX(CASE WHEN sn.string = 'briefdescription' AND sn.id = d.name_id THEN sv.string END ) AS briefdescription, MAX(CASE WHEN sn.string = 'address' AND sn.id = d.name_id THEN sv.string END ) AS address FROM elgg_metadata d JOIN elgg_metastrings sv ON d.value_id = sv.id JOIN elgg_metastrings sn ON d.name_id = sn.id JOIN elgg_entities e ON d.entity_guid = e.guid WHERE e.guid ='${ElggEntity.entity_guid}'

entity.name: ElggTags
entity.query: SELECT CASE WHEN sn.string = 'tags' AND sn.id = d.name_id THEN sv.string END AS tags FROM elgg_metadata d JOIN elgg_metastrings sv ON d.value_id = sv.id JOIN elgg_metastrings sn ON d.name_id = sn.id JOIN elgg_entities e ON d.entity_guid = e.guid WHERE e.guid = '${ElggEntity.entity_guid}' AND d.name_id = sn.id AND d.value_id = sv.id AND sn.string = 'tags'

entity.name: ElggTopicPosts
entity.query: SELECT CASE WHEN sn.string = 'group_topic_post' AND sn.id = d.name_id THEN sv.string END AS group_topic_post FROM elgg_annotations d JOIN elgg_metastrings sv ON d.value_id = sv.id JOIN elgg_metastrings sn ON d.name_id = sn.id JOIN elgg_entities e ON d.entity_guid = e.guid WHERE e.guid = '${ElggEntity.entity_guid}' AND d.name_id = sn.id AND d.value_id = sv.id AND sn.string = 'group_topic_post' ORDER BY d.id

entity.name: ElggGenericComment
entity.query: SELECT CASE WHEN sn.string = 'generic_comment' AND sn.id = d.name_id THEN sv.string END AS generic_comment FROM elgg_annotations d JOIN elgg_metastrings sv ON d.value_id = sv.id JOIN elgg_metastrings sn ON d.name_id = sn.id JOIN elgg_entities e ON d.entity_guid = e.guid WHERE e.guid = '${ElggEntity.entity_guid}' AND d.name_id = sn.id AND d.value_id = sv.id AND sn.string = 'generic_comment' ORDER BY d.id
